meanings.definition: A portable insulated container used for keeping food and drinks cold.
meanings.sent1: We took the esky to the beach to keep our drinks cold.
meanings.sent2: The esky was filled with ice packs to maintain the temperature of the beverages.
meanings.sent3: At the picnic, the esky became the coolest spot to hang out.
meanings.sent4: The esky was a chilly oasis in the scorching heat of the summer day.
meanings.sent5: The esky's ability to keep things cold amazed everyone at the party.

meanings.definition: To use an esky to store perishable items.
meanings.sent1: We eskyed the groceries after coming back from the store.
meanings.sent2: She eskyed the vegetables to keep them fresh for a longer time.
meanings.sent3: He eskyed the leftovers to prevent them from spoiling.
meanings.sent4: The campers eskyed their food to protect it from the heat.
meanings.sent5: They eskyed the dairy products to maintain their quality during the trip.
